definition: to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: But Baldwin admits his officers can't catch everything using scanners.
sentences.chinese: 鮑爾溫承認工作人員無法用掃描儀監控所有物品。

sentences.english: Censorship of printed and audiovisual media.
sentences.chinese: 緬甸的印刷媒體和視聽媒體均受政府監控。

sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 煙道氣樣品的監控系統速率成正比的煙氣體積流量。

sentences.english: Real-time monitor is implemented by computer and PLC system.
sentences.chinese: 由計算機與PLC系統實現實時監控。
我們會監控令郎的進展。

sentences.english: The temperature maps were overlayed on the anatomic images for monitoring the treatment.
sentences.chinese: 將溫度圖疊加在解剖圖上治療監控。

sentences.english: A network consisting of about 300,000 surveillance cameras covers the entire capital.
sentences.chinese: 30萬攝像頭組成的監控網絡覆蓋整座城市。

sentences.english: As a result, electrocardiogram equipment with remote monitor ability becomes a trend.
sentences.chinese: 具有遠程監控功能的心電儀應運而生。

sentences.english: Use the common change process to monitor and handle changes to tests.
sentences.chinese: 使用共同的變更處理過程來監控和操作測試的變更。

sentences.english: The regulatory environment may require that external bodies undertake monitoring and auditing.
sentences.chinese: 法規環境可要求由外部組織進行監控與稽覈。

sentences.english: All phases of production are monitored by in-process inspection.
sentences.chinese: 生產的每個階段都要經過程檢驗進行監控。

sentences.english: The college shall take measures at the headstream to promote teaching monitoring capability.
sentences.chinese: 應狠抓源頭，提高教師教學監控能力。

sentences.english: It should be expanded to include the strain now causing sickness in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 對於現今在歐洲引發疾病的病菌變種也須實施監控。

sentences.english: A base-station applied in mine monitoring system is a multi-task and real time system of information acquiring and transferring.
sentences.chinese: 礦井監控分站是一個多任務的實時採集與傳輸系統。

sentences.english: Trackside monitoring equipment would feed information to a receiver on the train.
sentences.chinese: 軌道旁監控設備會向列車上的接收器反饋信息。

sentences.english: Does the facility have procedures and maintain records to monitor the raw materia vendors?
sentences.chinese: 工廠內有沒有措施及記錄來監控物料供應商的來料？

definition: to monitor/to keep a close watch over/surveillance
to follow sb's tracks/to tail/to shadow/tracking
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
